description: New figures show "alarming rates of transmission across the region", the UN body says.
title: Coronavirus: WHO warns Europe over 'very serious' Covid surge
title_page: Coronavirus: WHO warns Europe over 'very serious' Covid surge - BBC News
maintext: While younger people - who are less likely to be severely impacted if they are infected - currently make up the largest proportion of newly recorded coronavirus cases, there are fears of many more cases of serious illness if the virus spreads to older and more vulnerable groups.
